tweet: Travel footnote, the: Any remark, observation, experience or piece of advice that could be a footnote in a travel guide.
Bangkok: The literal translation of the Thai word for "suicide" is: "crossing the street".
Bangkok: It is impossible to detect mosquitoes on violet walls.
Bangkok: If you're after an out-of-body experience, walk along tourist ghetto Khaosan Road at 10pm.
World: The journey of a thousand miles used to begin with the first step. These days, it begins on Expedia.
